mapper.select: SELECT crew_no, crew_name, crew_category, crew_location, crew_limit, crew_intro FROM crew ORDER BY crew_no DESC
SELECT crew_no, crew_name, crew_category, crew_location, crew_limit, crew_intro FROM crew WHERE crew_no = #{crewNo}
mapper.insert: insert into crew ( crew_no, crew_name, crew_category, crew_location, crew_limit, crew_intro ) VALUES ( #{crewNo}, #{crewName}, #{crewCategory}, #{crewLocation}, #{crewLimit}, #{crewIntro} )
mapper.update: UPDATE crew SET crew_name = #{crewName}, crew_category = #{crewCategory}, crew_location = #{crewLocation}, crew_limit = #{crewLimit}, crew_intro = #{crewIntro} WHERE crew_no = #{crewNo}
mapper.select: select attachment_no from crew_image where crew_no = #{crewNo}
